titleStmt.title: Profitable New-years-gift, teaching how to begin the year well, and end it comfortably: or, motives and directions for a daily exercise of Christianity, Gen. 5. 22, 24. Psal. 84.11.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by J. Conyers in Little Brittain, and R. Baldwin at the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text.
